Package courses

Class CourseDirectory

java.lang.Object
courses.CourseDirectory
public class CourseDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
This class will represent course directory of a school. It will contain a list of all the courses, a list of scheduled courses, and a list of unschedueld courses. We will be able to manipulate this data to do certain tasks, as well as using it to output some data onto the file.
Since:
: 12/04/2020

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CourseDirectory()
    The contructor for this class will initialize all the lists and will parse the courses and create sessions for those courses.

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseDirectory

      public CourseDirectory() throws java.lang.Exception
      The contructor for this class will initialize all the lists and will parse the courses and create sessions for those courses. The parseCourse method will read data from an input file and create courses with that file and add it to the courses list. After reading in the number of sessions while parsing course it will create sessions for that particular course
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - : file exceptions

  • Method Details

    • parseCourse

      public void parseCourse() throws java.lang.Exception
      This method will parse the courses. It will read in the input of courses from a file and create courses after reading the data. It will then add that course to the list of courses.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - : File error exceptions

    • getCourses

      public java.util.ArrayList<Course> getCourses()
      This method will return the list of courses
      Returns:
      courses

    • gStudentCourses

      public java.util.ArrayList<StudentCourse> gStudentCourses()
      This method will return the lust of StudentCourse. Student course is an abbreviated version of regular course object
      Returns:
      studentCourse

    • printCourses

      public java.lang.String printCourses()
      This method will build a string of all the courses
      Returns:
      : a string value of all the data of courses

    • createSessions

      public void createSessions() throws java.lang.Exception
      This method will create sessions for a course
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - : input mismatch exception when creating session object

    • sortScheduledCourse

      public void sortScheduledCourse()
      This method will go through the list of courses and check if the course can be schedueld or not. If it can be scheduled it will be added to that list or else it will be added to a list with unscheduled courses

    • sortScheduledSessions

      public void sortScheduledSessions()
      This method will go through the list of courses and check if each of the sessions can be scheduled. If it doesn't have enough people to meet the minimum class size requirement the session will be deleted from that course

    • scheduledCourseOutput

      public void scheduledCourseOutput() throws java.lang.Exception
      This method will output the following information to the ScheduledCourseSessions.txt file: 1) Each course that was scheduled (i.e. all the information of the class : the id, number of students, min and max requirements) 2) Each session for that course (the session ID is displayed) 3) The full name and id number of the instructor for the session 4) The number of students in session and the name and id of each student in each session
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - : throws file not found exception

    • unscheduledCourseOutput

      public void unscheduledCourseOutput() throws java.lang.Exception
      This method will output the following information to the UnscheduledCourseSessions.txt file: 1) Each course that was not scheduled (i.e. all the information of the class : the id, number of students, min and max requirements) 2) Minimum number of students that needed to be in that course
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - : file exceptions

    • getNumOfSessions

      public int getNumOfSessions()
      This method will return number of sessions scheduled.
      Returns:
      : sessions count

    • numOfUnscheduledCourses

      public int numOfUnscheduledCourses()
      This method will return the number of unscheduled courses
      Returns:
      number of unscheduled courses
